availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Warren County farmer. Kentucky native. Brother of James Doughty. Married Ann Benedict Doughty in 1855. Father of Alla P. Doughty and Emma C. Doughty.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 2, p. 118. Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1852-1910, Ancestry, Marriages, Barren County, 1855. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 1, p. 84. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Missouri, Cass County, Sugar Creek, p. 7. Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Texas, Tarrant County, Precinct 8, p. 36. “Preston Doughty,” Find A Grave, September 14, 2009, memorial no. 41949656.
